title: Just a Little Bit More!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Honoka-chan, if we don’t head to the movie theater now, we won’t make it in time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Wait, Riko-chan, just one more time! I’m so close to getting it~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You say one more time, but haven’t you been playing this crane game five times by now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>This time it’s really really going to be the last one! I’ll get it on the next one, I just know it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Geez, this is the absolute last one, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Okay. Alright, God, please lend my hands some of your power.... Here we go~, put the arm about here, and then around here.... Let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh, you’re doing it! Almost there, almost there....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yaaaaaay!!! I got it~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You’re amazing, Honoka-chan! I can’t believe you got it to drop from that spot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Thank you, Riko-chan! I’ll give you one of the chocolates from this sweets box as thanks for waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
